code: public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {     // set up the execution environment     final ExecutionEnvironment env = ExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment().     // get input data     DataSet<String> text = StaticData.getDefaultTextLineDataSet(env).     DataSet<Tuple2<String, Integer>> counts = // split up the lines in pairs (2-tuples) containing: (word,1)     text.flatMap(new ExternalTokenizer()).groupBy(0).sum(1).     // emit result     counts.print().     // execute program     env.execute("WordCount Example"). }
